document.full_text: wbo light-heavyweight champion juergen braehmer has pulled out of this weekend's title defense against nathan cleverly, the british challenger's camp said on wednesday.
document.title: braehmer pulls out of cleverly world title fight
lines_and_colors: wbo light-heavyweight champion juergen braehmer has pulled out of this weekend's title defense against nathan cleverly, the british challenger's camp said on wednesday.
